productName: E200 Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: E200 Automatic Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapper | High-Speed Industrial Packaging
metaDescription: The E200 automatic horizontal stretch wrapper delivers high-speed, reliable spiral wrapping for palletized loads. Features include PLC control, adjustable tension, and energy-efficient operation.
fullContentHtml:
E200 Horizontal Spiral Stretch Wrapping Machine

The E200 is a fully automatic horizontal spiral stretch wrapping machine designed for high-volume B2B packaging operations. Engineered for durability and precision, it ensures consistent load containment and protection during transit and storage.

Key Features

  • Advanced PLC control system with touchscreen interface
  • Adjustable spiral wrapping patterns and film tension
  • Energy-efficient direct drive motor system
  • Stainless steel construction in critical contact areas
  • Integrated safety guards and emergency stop
  • Compatible with various film types including pre-stretch film

Applications

Ideal for wrapping palletized goods in industries such as food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, logistics, and manufacturing. Suitable for uniform and irregular shaped loads.

productName: E500 Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapping System
seoTitle: E500 Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapping System | Automatic Pallet Wrapping Solution
metaDescription: High-speed automatic horizontal stretch wrapper for industrial pallet stabilization. Features orbital wrapping technology, PLC control, and energy-efficient operation for B2B packaging lines.
fullContentHtml:
E500 Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapping System

The E500 Orbital Horizontal Stretch Wrapping System represents the pinnacle of automated pallet wrapping technology. Designed for high-volume industrial applications, this system delivers consistent, secure wrapping with minimal operator intervention.

Key Features

  • Orbital Wrapping Technology: Advanced orbital rotation ensures uniform film distribution and superior load containment
  • Fully Automated Operation: PLC-controlled system with touchscreen interface for easy setup and monitoring
  • High-Speed Performance: Optimized for production lines requiring rapid throughput without compromising wrap quality
  • Adaptive Tension Control: Intelligent film tension management prevents tearing while maximizing stretch efficiency
  • Modular Design: Customizable configurations to accommodate various pallet sizes and production environments

Applications

Ideal for manufacturing facilities, distribution centers, and logistics operations requiring reliable, automated pallet stabilization for shipping and storage.

specifications.Safety Features: Emergency stop, safety curtains, overload protection

productName: Spiror E100 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: Spiror E100 Automatic Horizontal Stretch Wrapper | High-Speed Industrial Packaging
metaDescription: The Spiror E100 automatic horizontal stretch wrapper delivers high-speed, reliable pallet wrapping for industrial applications. Features include PLC control, adjustable tension, and energy-efficient operation.
fullContentHtml:
Spiror E100 Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine

The Spiror E100 is a fully automatic horizontal stretch wrapping machine designed for high-volume industrial packaging operations. Engineered for reliability and efficiency, this system streamlines pallet stabilization with consistent wrap tension and minimal film usage.

Key Features

  • Fully Automated Operation: PLC-controlled system with touchscreen interface for easy setup and monitoring.
  • High-Speed Wrapping: Capable of wrapping up to 120 pallets per hour, depending on configuration.
  • Adjustable Tension Control: Precision film tension settings to optimize load containment and reduce film waste.
  • Modular Design: Compatible with various conveyor systems and integration into existing packaging lines.
  • Energy Efficient: Low-power consumption motors and optimized cycle times reduce operational costs.
  • Safety Features: Includes emergency stop, safety curtains, and overload protection.

Applications

Ideal for industries requiring secure palletized loads for storage and transportation, including food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, logistics, and manufacturing.

productName: E300 Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: E300 Automatic Horizontal Stretch Wrapper | Industrial Packaging Solution
metaDescription: High-speed E300 automatic horizontal stretch wrapping machine for industrial pallet stabilization. Features orbital wrapping technology, PLC control, and energy-efficient operation.
fullContentHtml:
E300 Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine

The E300 represents the latest advancement in automatic horizontal stretch wrapping technology, designed for high-volume industrial packaging operations. This machine combines precision engineering with robust construction to deliver consistent, reliable pallet stabilization for various industries including logistics, manufacturing, and distribution centers.

Key Features

  • Orbital Wrapping Technology: Provides 360-degree uniform film application for superior load containment
  • PLC Control System: User-friendly interface with programmable wrapping patterns and tension control
  • High-Speed Operation: Capable of processing up to 120 pallets per hour depending on configuration
  • Adaptive Film Delivery: Automatic film tension adjustment for optimal stretch and material savings
  • Modular Design: Easy integration with existing conveyor systems and production lines
  • Safety Features: Emergency stop systems, safety curtains, and comprehensive fault diagnostics

Applications

Ideal for stabilizing palletized goods including boxes, bags, drums, and irregularly shaped loads. Suitable for food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, building materials, and consumer goods industries.

specifications.Max Load Dimensions: 1200mm x 1200mm x 2200mm (L x W x H)

E400 Automatic Horizontal Stretch Wrapping Machine

The E400 is a fully automatic horizontal stretch wrapping system designed for high-volume production environments. Engineered for durability and precision, this machine streamlines pallet stabilization with consistent wrap tension and minimal film waste.

Key Features

  • Fully Automated Operation: Programmable logic controller (PLC) with touchscreen interface for easy setup and monitoring.
  • High-Speed Wrapping: Capable of wrapping up to 120 pallets per hour, depending on load size and wrap pattern.
  • Energy-Efficient Design: Optimized motor and drive system reduces power consumption during operation.
  • Robust Construction: Heavy-duty steel frame and industrial-grade components ensure long-term reliability in demanding conditions.
  • Versatile Compatibility: Accommodates a wide range of pallet sizes and load types with adjustable turntable and mast settings.
  • Safety Features: Includes emergency stop, safety curtains, and overload protection for operator and equipment safety.

Applications

Ideal for warehouses, distribution centers, manufacturing plants, and logistics operations requiring consistent, secure pallet wrapping for shipping and storage.

productName: E2400 Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: E2400 Automatic Horizontal Stretch Wrapper | Industrial Packaging Solution
metaDescription: High-speed E2400 automatic horizontal stretch wrapping machine for industrial pallet stabilization. Features orbital wrapping technology, adjustable tension control, and PLC automation.
fullContentHtml:
E2400 Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine

The E2400 represents the latest advancement in automatic horizontal stretch wrapping technology, designed specifically for high-volume B2B packaging operations. This industrial-grade machine utilizes orbital wrapping methodology to provide superior load stability and protection during transportation and storage.

Key Features

  • Orbital Wrapping Technology: Rotates the film carriage around stationary pallets for consistent tension distribution
  • PLC Control System: Programmable logic controller with touchscreen interface for precise operation settings
  • Adjustable Tension Control: Digital tension adjustment from 10-100% capacity
  • Automatic Film Cutting: Heat-seal cutting system with automatic film clamping
  • Safety Features: Emergency stop, safety curtains, and overload protection
  • Modular Design: Easy maintenance access and component replacement

Applications

Ideal for packaging operations in manufacturing, distribution centers, and logistics facilities handling standardized pallet sizes. Suitable for wrapping products including boxes, bags, containers, and irregular-shaped loads when used with appropriate accessories.

Operation Benefits

The E2400 reduces labor costs by up to 70% compared to manual wrapping methods while improving consistency and reducing film waste by 15-25%. The machine's quiet operation (below 75 dB) makes it suitable for production floor environments without requiring additional soundproofing.

specifications.Safety Features: Emergency stop, safety curtains, overload protection

Applications

specifications.Speed: Adjustable up to 30 cycles per minute

productName: Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine for Bar and Rod
seoTitle: Custom Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine | Bar & Rod Packaging Solution
metaDescription: Professional-grade horizontal orbital stretch wrapping machine for bars and rods. Customizable wrapping solutions with precise tension control and durable construction for industrial applications.
fullContentHtml:
Professional Horizontal Orbital Stretch Wrapping Machine

Our horizontal orbital stretch wrapping machine is engineered specifically for wrapping bars, rods, and long cylindrical products with precision and efficiency. This industrial-grade solution provides consistent wrapping tension and secure load containment for transportation and storage.

Key Features

  • Horizontal Orbital Design: Rotates around the product horizontally for complete 360-degree coverage
  • Adjustable Tension Control: Precise film tension settings for optimal load stability
  • Variable Speed Operation: Adjustable rotation speed from 5-20 RPM to match production requirements
  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Industrial-grade steel frame with powder-coated finish
  • Customizable Fixtures: Adaptable to various bar and rod diameters and lengths
  • Safety Features: Emergency stop, safety guards, and overload protection

Applications

Ideal for metal bars, construction rebar, PVC pipes, timber, and other long cylindrical products requiring secure wrapping for protection during shipping and storage.

Benefits

  • Reduces material costs with optimized film usage
  • Improves workplace safety with automated wrapping process
  • Enhances product protection during transit
  • Increases packaging efficiency and throughput
  • Customizable for specific product dimensions and wrapping patterns

productName: A100 Semi-Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: A100 Semi-Automatic Pallet Wrapping Machine | Industrial Stretch Wrapper
metaDescription: The A100 semi-automatic pallet stretch wrapping machine offers efficient, reliable load stabilization for warehouses and distribution centers. Features adjustable tension control and user-friendly operation.
fullContentHtml:
Efficient and Reliable Semi-Automatic Pallet Wrapping

The A100 Semi-Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is designed for businesses seeking a balance between manual operation and full automation. This machine provides consistent, high-quality wrapping while maintaining operational simplicity.

Key Features

  • Adjustable Tension Control: Precise film tension settings for optimal load containment
  • User-Friendly Interface: Simple controls with clear indicators for easy operation
  • Versatile Turntable: Accommodates various pallet sizes and load types
  • Durable Construction: Industrial-grade components for long-term reliability
  • Safety Features: Emergency stop button and protective guarding

Applications

Ideal for warehouses, distribution centers, manufacturing facilities, and logistics operations requiring consistent pallet stabilization without the complexity of fully automated systems.

Operation

The operator places the pallet on the turntable, attaches the film to the load, and initiates the wrapping cycle. The machine automatically completes the programmed wrap pattern while the operator prepares the next load, increasing productivity.

productName: A200 Automated Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
seoTitle: A200 Semi-Automatic Pallet Wrapping Machine | Industrial Stretch Wrapper
metaDescription: The A200 semi-automatic pallet wrapping machine offers efficient, reliable stretch wrapping for industrial applications. Features adjustable tension control, variable speed, and robust construction.
fullContentHtml:
Efficient and Reliable Semi-Automatic Pallet Wrapping

The A200 Automated Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is designed for businesses seeking a balance between manual operation and full automation. This semi-automatic system streamlines your pallet wrapping process while maintaining operational flexibility.

Key Features

  • Adjustable Tension Control: Precisely control film tension to accommodate various load types and stability requirements
  • Variable Speed Operation: Adjust wrapping speed from 10-30 RPM to match your production workflow
  • Turntable Load Capacity: Supports pallets up to 2,000 kg with stable rotation
  • User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive controls with pre-set wrapping programs for common applications
  • Robust Construction: Heavy-duty steel frame with powder-coated finish for industrial durability
  • Safety Features: Emergency stop button, safety curtains, and overload protection

Applications

Ideal for warehouses, distribution centers, manufacturing facilities, and logistics operations handling 20-80 pallets per day. Suitable for food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, chemicals, and general manufacturing industries.

Operation

The operator places the pallet on the turntable, secures the film to the load, selects the wrapping program, and initiates the cycle. The machine automatically completes the wrap pattern while the operator prepares the next pallet, significantly increasing throughput compared to manual wrapping.
